Key Match Events: Steven Kwan made a spectacular diving catch in a clutch situation to keep the scores tied in their American League Division Series clash against the Detroit Tigers.
Post-Match Reflections: Kerry Carpenter hit a three-run homer off Clase in the ninth inning to help the Tigers beat the Guardians 3-0 and level the ALDS at one win apiece.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The disputed catch was a crucial moment in the game at the time, but it turned out to be inconsequential in the end.
Steven Kwan has taken another step forward in his career during his third season with the Guardians, after finishing third in the AL Rookie of the Year voting in 2022.
Others: The incident sparked hot debates among MLB fans on social media as to whether Kwan actually made the catch.
Some fans believe the video umpires did not make the right call.
The wider consensus seems to believe that Steven Kwan grabbed the ball cleanly before it touched the grass.
